title: Blood Donation Drive on occasion of Gandhi Jayanti
location: Aashiyana Hall, Above E-shop, IIT Kanpur
description: Join us for blood donation drive on occasion of Gandhi Jayanti.You don't need to be doctor to save lives; your willingness to donate blood can make you an angel in someone's story. Professional medical staff and refreshments provided.

title: Republic Day Mega Blood Donation Camp
description: Join us for our one of the biggest blood donation drive of the year. By donating blood, you give someone the gift of life, a chance to see another sunrise and the opportunity to create their own ripples of change. Professional medical staff and refreshments provided.

title: Independence Day Mega Blood Donation Camp
description: This Independence Day, we honored our nation not just with tricolors, but with countless drops of hope. Thank you to everyone who joined our Blood Donation Camp and made it a grand success.

title: Blood Donation Drive on Occasion of Republic Day
location: Aashiyana Hall (Above E-shop), Hall-11, GH-1, Hall-12
description: Freedom. Unity. Donation. Our Republic Day camp was a true celebration of life.

title: 10th November Blood Donation Drive
location: Aashiyana Hall, Above E-shop, IIT Kanpur
description: Another Blood Donation Camp successfully organized with inspiring response. Grateful to all the donors for turning kindness into life.

title: 27th October Blood Donation Camp
location: Aashiyana Hall, Above E-shop, IIT Kanpur
description: In every vein of kindness, a life was saved, our Blood Donation Camp became a living tribute to humanity spirit.

title: 8th October Blood Donation Drive
description: A day of compassion and life : heartfelt thanks to all who donated.

title: Gandhi Jayanti Blood Camp
location: Yoga Hall, New Sac, IIT Kanpur
description: Patriotic blood donation drive on Independence Day with great community participation.

title: Ganeshotsav Special Blood Drive
location: Hall of Fame, Outreach Auditourium, IIT Kanpur
description: This Ganeshotsav, let your devotion shine through the gift of blood — a blessing for those in need.

title: Independence Day Special Mega Camp
description: Patriotic blood donation drive on Independence Day with great community participation.

title: Blood Donor Day Blood Drive
description: Celebrate compassion on Blood Donor Day with the noblest gift — blood donation.

title: Diamond Jubliee Blood Donation Camp
description: Celebrate Republic Day by serving the nation through blood donation. Patriotic themed event.

title: Special Blood Drive
location: Aashiyana Hall, Above E-shop, IIT Kanpur
description: Celebrate the spirit of giving at our special blood donation camp — because saving lives is the greatest celebration.

title: Ganeshotsav Special Blood Donation Camp
location: Hall of Fame, Outreach Auditourium, IIT Kanpur
description: Offer a true prayer this Ganeshotsav — donate blood and remove obstacles from someone’s life.

title: Independence Day Blood Donation Camp
location: Aashiyana Hall, Above E-shop, IIT Kanpur
description: Celebrating freedom by giving the gift of life ; our Independence Day Blood Donation Camp saw inspiring participation.

title: Covocation'23 Special Blood Donation Camp
location: Yoga Hall, New Sac, IIT Kanpur
description: Celebrate Convocation by spreading the gift of life — donate blood and make this milestone truly meaningful.

title: World Donor Day Blood Donation Drive
location: Aashiyana Hall, Above E-shop, IIT Kanpur
description: World Blood Donor Day became a festival of generosity as donors came forward to save lives, proving that small acts of kindness create big impacts.
